page.title: 13A PRIORY CHOIRBOY'S LIFE
page.content: We are in the Priory Choir, practising three times a week.On a Wednesday we have a short practice,a talk with Mr.Rigby,then we play football.On the other days we just sing.We sing for to services each Sunday and practice before each. { After six months you have earned a {choir boy's collar to go with the red {cassock we all wear;medals are {awarded for long_service ;responsible {boys can become choir leaders. We get about Â£7.50 every three months that is if we go to nearly all the practices and we don't mess around.If we mess around we lose pay, this year our choir trip is going to Drayton Manor Park. { Our favourite song is an anthem, the {Te Deum which we sang when the Duchess {of Gloucester came for the 900th {Celebration Service. }
